attributes.additional_details: Nuclear weapons are very dangerous and can have lasting effect if used. Why should the Government invest billions into Trident but never use it!
attributes.background: Disarm all of the UK's Nuclear weapons to save billions of pounds and invest this money in worthwhile causes eg. NHS and cost of living

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625539
